b. The balance in full when the completed

7. in the event more than three weeks is deemed
to be necessary and mutually agreed upon by the
Government and the NAKB or its representative on
the team, this control may be extended by order of
the Government at the rate of $1,900.00 per week.
This figure would not include any transportation
and is for the basic team only.
8. Any changes in this contract must be mutually
agreed upon and subjected to approval by the President
of the NAEB and the Governor oÂ£ American Samoa.
